title: Constructivist-Based e-Learning Learning Object Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and professional practical experience in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Instructional competency enhancement program for pre-service and in-service teachers. Utilizes constructivist approaches to math learning objects in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners enhance real-world professional problem-solving skills by utilizing mathematics learning objects designed according to constructivist principles
Learners achieve over 80% participation in collaborative knowledge-building with peers through LMS interactive tools
Learners independently perform self-directed learning activities at least three times weekly using mobile-optimized learning objects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
